modName: Main Menu Music Replacer The Hobbit Misty Mountain Song
summary: Replaces the main menu music with Misty mountains cold from the hobbit trailer.
descriptionHtml:
Replaces main menu music with Misty mountains cold from the hobbit trailer http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G0k3kHtyoqc

This mod will be updated once full version of this song releases in the LOTR soundtrack.

I suggest you download http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5729 with this mod
to give it that misty mountain feel but make sure to apply it first before applying this mod.

Installation: To Install replace the data folder with the mods data folder
 
\"Known problem\"
I know the song doesn\'t sound very loudly, I\'ve tried making it louder but If I do it damages the original way it sounds, so its as loud as I could make it.
author: Gameguru88
